name: Jumpy (RaneStudios)
description:
It's a very simple game.You are a cube. You move. You jump. You control gravity. You teleport.

You try to SURVIVE!

Okay, I assure you, it may sound like it, but this is not your typical platformer. And don't be deceived by its cutesy name. You will definitely find its challenge worthy of your time.

Note: Make sure you play the How to Play section before you dive into the game. It's short, you'll be ready in no time!
